abilities.desc: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.notes: Juggernaut can still perform attacks while in Blade Fury. However, only units that are not affected by Blade Fury, such as wards or structures, will take damage from these attacks.

abilities.desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 325 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts [25] seconds.
abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.notes: Multiple Healing Wards do not stack.

abilities.desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal critical damage on each attack.
abilities.name: Blade Dance

abilities.desc: Performs a short Omnislash for 0.8 seconds.
abilities.name: Swiftslash

abilities.desc: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy units, and then slashes the target and other nearby enemy units at an increased attack rate. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.notes: Omnislash applies a basic dispel to Juggernaut on cast.
